name: Tim is Hungry
description:
Overview

Tim is a frog.

Tim is very hungry.

That moon looks delicious though.

Tim's dream is to get close, grab it with his tongue, and swallow all that delicious cheese (?). And you're going to help!

Move with A and D or the arrows. You can jump with W or space and perform a tongue grab with S or enter.

Game Jam

We made this for the 106th Mini Jam. It's our first try making a jam game, so thanks in advance for playing, and we always appreciate feedback! :)

The theme of the jam was frogs, and the limitation was a time limit. So our main character is a frog, and he has a hunger timer constantly counting down. He can buy himself more time by eating his enemies, but it's only a few seconds of extra life... Eventually you must perish. Or eat the moon. Your choice.

Credits

This jam is our first time making a whole game from scratch! We developed all the graphics, code, and sounds ourselves except the following:

The main tileset is a palette swap and partial redesign of one by Kenney.nl on opengameart.org.

The title font is Panipuri by Khurasan, and the main text is Rainy Hearts by Camellina. Not sure about that name though - anyone can see they're flies!

The game is written in Godot, with graphics drawn in Photoshop and Aseprite, sound effects recorded in Audacity, and music composed in MuseScore.
